name: Pull the Lever
description:
The Trolley Problem is a classic moral dilemma that is often used in ethics classes and philosophical discussions everywhere. Making the Trolley Problem more real can teach us a little bit about how we all actually make decisions.

This short game explores the difference between seeing a moral decision on paper and running into the same situation in the real world. Is it as easy as simply pulling the lever?
